resources.string: 1.What was the theme of the 2018 World Earth Day?
2. Which country has agreed to halt its nuclear tests and ICBM launches?
3.What does the five interlinked Olympic rings on the flag represent?

6.Who is the first Indian to participate in Olympics ?
7.Olympic Flag was introduced for first time during which Olympic Games ?
